summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Eleventh Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street to University Blvd. et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 18653, creating Local Improvement District No. 1754 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
